title: Introduction to Dart
description: Learn the basics of Dart programming language, its history, and why it's popular with Flutter.

title: Dart Basics
description: Master variables, data types, operators, and comments - the building blocks of Dart programming.

title: Control Flow
description: Learn conditional statements, loops, and how to control the flow of your Dart programs.

title: Functions
description: Understand how to create and use functions, including parameters and arrow functions.

title: Collections
description: Work with Lists, Sets, and Maps - the essential data structures in Dart.

title: Object-Oriented Programming
description: Learn classes, objects, inheritance, and other OOP concepts in Dart.

title: Error Handling
description: Master exception handling with try-catch blocks and custom error management.

title: Null Safety
description: Understand Dart's null safety features and how to handle nullable types.

title: Async Programming
description: Introduction to asynchronous programming with Futures and async/await.

title: Mini Projects
description: Apply your Dart knowledge by building practical projects and applications.
